title: SOLO DANCE - DANCE TILL DAWN
description: Do you have what it takes to put on a one-man show? On the dance floor, you are in control of the rhythm. Set yourself loose and let the music move you. Swing and sway to steal everyone's hearts!.
registration: This event comes under general registration.
rules: Participants can dance to any song of their choice.
The time limit will be a maximum of 3 minutes.
Music can be chosen by the participant .
Music tracks must be handed over to the event organizers 30 minutes prior to the event.
Participants should bring their own props. The event coordinator must be notified about all the props used.
The lighting of matchsticks, candles, cigarettes, or any other derogatory acts are strictly prohibited.
Any obscene or controversial music will not be permitted.
The Judgesâ€™ decisions will be final.
